---
name: Meeting Notes Template
about: Track a unit of work within the project lifecycle
title: "Upload Weekly Meeting Notes to Wiki: Week XX"
labels: []
assignees: []
---

## 1. Description
 Brief and explanotory description of the problem

## 2. Tasks / Acceptance Criteria
Checklist of actionable steps.

- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3

## 3. Dependencies
List blocking or related issues.

- Depends on: #
- Related to: #


## 4. References
Links, papers, specs, designs, or prior issues.


## 5. Notes
Any extra context, assumptions, or future considerations.
